intro: Greetings, traveler. Would you like to hear a tale of heroism?
story_1: Long ago, in the land of Gondor, there lived a brave ranger named Aragorn...
story_2: Aragorn journeyed far and wide, facing many perils along the way...
story_3: In the end, Aragorn's courage and wisdom prevailed, and he became the king of Gondor...
conclusion: And so ends the tale of Aragorn, the rightful king and protector of the realm.
